@MirMayne @Netlify @zeithq If you've pre-generated a page and URL for every route, it sounds like you something's wrong. But if you are using it as a Single Page App and depend on client-side js for the navigation, you'll need to tell Netlify that all URLs point to the same page: https://t.co/LizabFYWAL
